app.title: Nova Tools
app.subtitle: Innovative Tools Platform for Agile Methodologies
app.description: A platform that offers a set of innovative tools to facilitate the implementation of agile methodologies in development teams. Our goal is to provide modern and intuitive solutions that improve collaboration and efficiency in agile processes.

planningVotes.title: Planning Votes
planningVotes.subtitle: Estimate your tasks collaboratively with your team

createRoom.title: Create New Room
createRoom.description: Set up a Planning Votes room to estimate tasks with your team

joinRoom.title: Join a Room
joinRoom.description: Enter the room code and your username to join an existing Planning Votes session
joinRoom.roomCodeHelp: The code is shared by the room creator
joinRoom.usernameLabel: Enter your name to identify yourself

room.title: Room

welcomeModal.title: Welcome to the Room
welcomeModal.description: To participate in this Planning Votes session, you need to identify yourself with a username

tooltips.average: The arithmetic mean of all votes. Calculated by adding all vote values and dividing by the number of votes.
tooltips.median: The middle value when all votes are arranged in order. Less affected by outliers than the average.
tooltips.min: The lowest vote value submitted by any team member.
tooltips.max: The highest vote value submitted by any team member.

room.alreadyVoted: You've already voted for this task

notifications.newVoting: A new voting round has started
notifications.allVotesIn: All votes are in! Check the statistics.
notifications.taskChangedByCreator: The admin has changed the current task
notifications.lastTask: This is the last task in the list
notifications.connectionError: Connection error. Unable to join the room.

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: Add the tasks you want to estimate with your team:

mainMenu.title: Welcome to the Platform
mainMenu.subtitle: Discover tools to improve your productivity and team collaboration.

appSelection.title: Select an Application
appSelection.subtitle: Choose the application you want to use.

planningVotes.title: Planning Votes
planningVotes.description: Estimate tasks collaboratively with your team.

quiz.title: Interactive Quiz
quiz.description: Participate in fun quizzes and learn.

roomNotFound.title: Room Not Found
roomNotFound.description: The room with ID <1>{{roomId}}</1> does not exist or is no longer available.
roomNotFound.gifAlt: Animated magnifying glass searching for a room

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.subtitle: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.
notFound.description: The URL you entered does not correspond to any valid page. You may have mistyped the address or the page may have been moved.

protectedRoute.connectionRequired: A connection to the service is required to access this functionality. Please wait while we attempt to reconnect.

connectionHelper.checkServer: Verify that the server is running at {{url}}
connectionHelper.refreshPage: Refresh the page to try reconnecting

resumeVotes.title: Voting Summary
resumeVotes.subtitle: Complete analysis of {{totalTasks}} tasks with {{totalVotes}} votes

loading.title: Loading voting summary...
loading.description: We're retrieving your voting session data.

error.title: Error loading data
error.description: We couldn't load the voting session information.

emptyState.title: No voting data available
emptyState.description: To view the voting summary, you need to complete a Planning Votes session with your team.

suggestions.participants: Make sure there are participants in the room
suggestions.votes: Complete at least one voting round

auth.title: Connect with Jira
auth.description: Authorize the connection with your Jira account to export estimated tasks.
auth.completeAuthMessage: Complete the authentication in the window that opened. It will be detected automatically when finished.
auth.popupBlockedMessage: Could not open the authentication window. Check that popups are not blocked.

select.title: Select Destination
select.description: Choose the project and epic where tasks will be created.

createEpic.title: Create New Epic
createEpic.description: Define the details of the new epic that will contain the tasks.
createEpic.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the objective and scope of this epic...

preview.title: Preview
preview.description: Review the details before creating tasks in Jira.

creating.title: Creating Tasks
creating.description: We're creating tasks in Jira. This process may take a few moments.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
